file_name: GentechHoldingsInc_20190808_1-A_EX1A-6 MAT CTRCT_11776814_EX1A-6 MAT CTRCT_Distributor Agreement.txt

perturbation.original_text: Company desires to appoint Distributor as its exclusive distributor of the Products to all Clients that Distributor introduce, and upon confirmed the first order, this client come to be exclusive of Distributor, every new customer introduced by Distributor, must be approved by the company prior to any sale. After official approval from the Company, the customer introduced by Distributor, will appear on an official list in this contract, and will only be met by the Distributor and will follow the rules of this agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Company desires to appoint Distributor as its exclusive distributor of the Products to all Clients that Distributor introduce, and upon confirmed the first order, this client come to be exclusive of Distributor, every new purchaser introduced by Distributor, may or may not require approval by the company prior to any sale. All new purchasers introduced by Distributor, at the Company's discretion, may appear on an official list, but this is not guaranteed, and may or may not be exclusively met by the Distributor following the rules of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Client' and 'purchaser' are used interchangeably, creating ambiguity as to whether they refer to the same entity. This introduces contradiction by modifying the obligations of approval and exclusivity of those introduced by the distributor, making it discretionary instead of mandatory, leading to uncertainty in enforcement. Previously the term 'must' was used but this has been replaced by 'may or may not require approval'.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor may appoint, with prior approval of the Company, sub-agents, sub-distributors, sub-representatives or other persons to act on Distributor's behalf or to otherwise perform any of Distributor's obligations under this Agreement within the Territory; provided that (i) any compensation to such sub-agent, sub-distributor, sub-representative or other person to act on Distributor's behalf or to otherwise perform any of Distributor's obligations shall be solely Distributor's responsibility, and (ii) such appointment does not deprive Company of the essential rights to which it is entitled under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor may appoint, with prior approval of the Company, sub-agents, associate distributors, sub-representatives or other persons to act on Distributor's behalf or to otherwise perform any of Distributor's obligations under this Agreement within the Territory; provided that (i) any compensation to such sub-agent, associate distributors, sub-representative or other person to act on Distributor's behalf or to otherwise perform any of Distributor's obligations shall be subject to Company approval and partially Distributor's responsibility, and (ii) such appointment may deprive Company of the essential rights to which it is entitled under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'sub-distributor' is replaced by 'associate distributor,' which is not defined in the contract. 'Associate distributor' introduces a conflicting compensation clause and the essential rights to which the distributor is entitled under the agreement, creating ambiguity. This could give the impression that the company can alter the essential rights outlined in the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Upon Customer's acceptance of any order, Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer at least Twenty-Five Percent (25%) of the total order price. Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer the remaining balance upon receipt Packing List and Bill of landing documents, from origin in Brazil Farm.
perturbation.changed_text: Upon Customer's acceptance of any order, Distributor shall submit to Client via wire transfer at least Fifty Percent (50%) of the total order price. Distributor shall submit to Client via wire transfer the remaining balance 30 days after reception of Packing List and Bill of landing documents, from origin in Brazil Farm.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Customer' and 'Client' are used interchangeably without definition, creating ambiguity about which entity is responsible for payment. By altering the percentage and timeframe of wire transfers creates a direct conflict with what was previously stated.
